item.title: Raised bitumen circular " roundabout " in HA at intersection, 10th January
item.description:
Bitumen surface , is not level, thus difficult to walk on . Danger to parents/children and elderly . Needs to be pedestrian friendly. Dangerous as cars are often speeding up and down Harland Ave.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 103, Harland Avenue, Longlands, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Can cracked road surface be inspected please?, 10th January
item.description:
This should be patched up if possible please?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 46A, White Horse Hill, Coldharbour, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road Surfacing Degraded, 10th January
item.description:
Cracking, Poor surface, Subsidence, Bitumen not laid to correct angle...causing pooling of water ,,cant run away to the gully drain in the immediate vicinty. As this Harland Ave intersection with Brooklands avenue is a route to the Dulverton Primary School , heavy use by parents with multiple children and scooters have to cross the dual carriagway of Harland Ave . Same problems on the otherside of Harland with intersection with Mardchal Ave . A danger..to all who pass thru the intersection

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 112, Harland Avenue, Longlands, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Builders rubbish and fly tipping in front yard of 24 Montague Road, 10th January
item.description:
Builders left a large amount of rubbish in the front yard of 24 Montague Rd (and my flat is next door), when they stopped work there in early December. By now this has attracted more rubbish, fly tipping and occasional dubious intruders.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Montague Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Fly-tip Small - Less than one bag

item.title: The Recycling not collected 3- 4 weeks, 10th January
item.description:
Hi The recycling rubbish has not been collected for 3 - 4 weeks. at Alderman's House E95QY. This is a health and safety issue as the rubbish is a fire risk piled up next to gas pipes and meters. It is also a health risk that attracts vermin . Please sort.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Ward Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegally parked cars on Kidbrooke square, 10th January
item.description:
There are multiple cars parked everyday on double yellow lines despite reminders from the building management to remove them. Please can this be resolved.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Glenside Grove, Kidbrooke
Report on FixMyStreet
